name: Automate responses to business emails with Make AI Tools and Google Sheets (draft emails)
description:
Leverage the power of Make AI Tools and Google Sheets to automate responses for business emails, improve workflow, save time, and enhance customer communications. This automation creates a draft email of the response for you to review before forwarding.

Please note: While in open beta, Make AI Tools has a 10m input and 10m output token limit.
